GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a specified article by id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates a specified articles' vote count and serves article back

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to specified article and serves back updated article with additional properties

exampleBodySent.body: Totally agree, thank you for posting this

commentPosted.body: Totally agree, thank you for posting this
commentPosted.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:commend_id.description: removes a specified comment and serves nothing if successful
